```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(hrbrthemes)
```

# Data

```{r data, }
sim <- read_csv("data/out.csv")
```

# Plot

```{r plot, }
# Remove initial add and intermediate queues
dst_view <- sim %>%
    filter(src != "demand", # remove init
           !grepl(pattern = "-", x = dst_queue))

dst_view %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = time,
               y = packet,
               color = dst_queue)) +
    geom_point(size = .2) +
    facet_grid(dst_queue~dst) +
    labs(x = NULL,
         y = "packet number",
         title = "Packet arrival time per (src, dst) pair",
         subtitle = "Rows are sources, columns are destinations") +
    guides(color = F) +
    theme_ipsum_rc()
```
